member.name: T:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.SecuritySettings
member.summary: Represents the security configuration of an out-of-browser application.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.SecuritySettings.ElevatedPermissionsProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the out-of-browser application requires elevated permissions.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.SecuritySettings.ElevatedPermissions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the out-of-browser application requires elevated permissions.

member.name: T:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.OutOfBrowserSettings
member.summary: Represents information about an application that is configured for out-of-browser support.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.OutOfBrowserSettings.BlurbProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a short description of the application.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.OutOfBrowserSettings.EnableGPUAccelerationProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to use graphics processor unit hardware acceleration for cached compositions, which potentially results in graphics optimization.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.OutOfBrowserSettings.IconsProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of icon images associated with the application.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.OutOfBrowserSettings.SecuritySettingsProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the security settings applied to the out-of-browser application.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.OutOfBrowserSettings.ShortNameProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the short version of the application title.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.OutOfBrowserSettings.ShowInstallMenuItemProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the application right-click menu includes an install option.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.OutOfBrowserSettings.WindowSettingsProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the settings applied to the application window.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of OutOfBrowserSettings.

member.name: T:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.Deployment
member.summary: Provides application part and localization information in the application manifest when deploying a Silverlight-based application.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.Deployment.EntryPointAssemblyProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a string name that identifies which part in the System.Windows.Deployment is the entry point assembly.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.Deployment.EntryPointTypeProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that identifies the namespace and type name of the class that contains the System.Windows.Application entry point for your application.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.Deployment.ExternalCallersFromCrossDomainProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the level of access that cross-domain callers have to the Silverlight-based application in this deployment.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.Deployment.ExternalPartsProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of System.Windows.ExternalPart instances that represent the external assemblies required by the application.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.Deployment.OutOfBrowserSettingsProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets an object that contains information about the application that is used for out-of-browser support.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.Deployment.PartsProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of assembly parts that are included in the deployment.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.Deployment.RuntimeVersionProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the Silverlight runtime version that this deployment supports.

member.summary: Constructs a manifest.

member.summary: Gets or sets a string that identifies the namespace and type name of the class that contains the System.Windows.Application entry point for your application.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the level of access that cross-domain callers have to the Silverlight-based application in this deployment.

member.name: T:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.WindowSettings
member.summary: Represents information about an out-of-browser application window.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.WindowSettings.HeightProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial window height of the application.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.WindowSettings.LeftProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial position of the left edge of the out-of-browser application window when System.Windows.WindowSettings.WindowStartupLocation is System.Windows.WindowStartupLocation.Manual.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.WindowSettings.TitleProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the full title of the out-of-browser application for display in the title bar of the application window.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.WindowSettings.TopProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial position of the top edge of the out-of-browser application window when System.Windows.WindowSettings.WindowStartupLocation is System.Windows.WindowStartupLocation.Manual.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.WindowSettings.WidthProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial window width of the application.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.WindowSettings.WindowStartupLocationProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates how the out-of-browser application window is positioned at startup.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.WindowSettings.WindowStyleProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the appearance of the title bar and border for the out-of-browser application window.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.WindowSettings.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial window height of the application.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.WindowSettings.Left
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial position of the left edge of the out-of-browser application window when System.Windows.WindowSettings.WindowStartupLocation is System.Windows.WindowStartupLocation.Manual.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.WindowSettings.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the full title of the out-of-browser application for display in the title bar of the application window.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.WindowSettings.Top
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial position of the top edge of the out-of-browser application window when System.Windows.WindowSettings.WindowStartupLocation is System.Windows.WindowStartupLocation.Manual.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.WindowSettings.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial window width of the application.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.WindowSettings.WindowStartupLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates how the out-of-browser application window is positioned at startup.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.WindowSettings.WindowStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the appearance of the title bar and border for the out-of-browser application window.

member.name: T:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Xap
member.summary: Represents a downloaded Xap, including the bytes that were downloaded, the assemblies that were loaded, and a parsed version of the AppManifest.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Xap.Assemblies
member.summary: Gets the set of Assemblies (including "cached assemblies") found within the Xap.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Xap.EntryPointAssembly
member.summary: Gets the entry point assembly (indicated by the manifest) for the Xap.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Xap.EntryPointType
member.summary: Gets the entry point type (indicated by the manifest) for the Xap.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Xap.Manifest
member.summary: Gets the parsed AppManifest of the Xap.

member.name: T:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.Icon
member.summary: Represents an icon that is used to identify an offline application.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.Icon.SizeProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the icon size.

member.name: F:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.Icon.SourceProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the path and file name to the PNG source file of the icon.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.Icon.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the icon size.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.Deployment.Icon.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the path and file name to the PNG source file of the icon.

member.name: T:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.XapLoader
member.summary: A utility class that can be used to load Xaps and their accompanying cached assemblies.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.XapLoader.BeginLoadXap(System.Uri,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Asynchronously loads a Xap at the given Uri.
member.param: The Uri that contains the location of the Xap.
The callback to be invoked when the operation completes.
Custom state to be carried with the async operation.
member.returns: A XapAsyncResult that can be used to retrieve the loaded Xap.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.XapLoader.BeginLoadXap(System.IO.Stream,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Asynchronously loads a Xap from the given stream.
member.param: The stream from which to load the Xap.
The callback to be invoked when the operation completes.
Custom state to be carried with the async operation.
member.returns: A XapAsyncResult that can be used to retrieve the loaded Xap.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.XapLoader.CancelLoadXap(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Cancels loading of a Xap.
member.param: The XapAsyncResult that was returned by BeginLoadXap.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.XapLoader.EndLoadXap(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Completes an asynchronous load of a Xap.
member.param: The XapAsyncResult that was returned by BeginLoadXap (or passed into the callback).

member.name: T:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.XapLoader.XapAsyncResult
member.summary: An AsyncResult used when loading Xaps.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.XapLoader.XapAsyncResult.ActiveClients
member.summary: Gets the set of active SimpleWebClients that were used to download the Xap and its dependencies.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.XapLoader.XapAsyncResult.Progress
member.summary: Gets the download progress (in terms of bytes downloaded/known total size).

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.XapLoader.XapAsyncResult.AsyncState
member.summary: Gets the AsyncState passed into BeginLoadXap.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.XapLoader.XapAsyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle
member.summary: Gets a WaitHandle that will be set when the operation completes.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.XapLoader.XapAsyncResult.CompletedSynchronously
member.summary: Gets whether the operation completed synchronously.

member.name: P:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.XapLoader.XapAsyncResult.IsCompleted
member.summary: Gets whether the operation has completed.

member.name: E:SLaB.Utilities.Xap.XapLoader.XapAsyncResult.PropertyChanged
member.summary: An event that is raised when Progress changes.
